about_the_game:
Conquer the Aztec Realm!
Smelogs Playground invites you to enter the mystical realm of ancient Aztec civilization. Build your base, command armies, and wield powerful magical spells. Whether you’re a seasoned strategist or a newcomer to the genre, Smelogs Playground offers an immersive experience that combines strategy, combat, and enchantment.

Base Building

Construct your Aztec stronghold from the ground up. Gather resources, construct Cave systems, and fortify walls. Will you create an impenetrable fortress or an elaborate maze of traps? Your base is the heart of your empire, and its design will impact your success on the battlefield.

Dynamic Sidegrade

In the mystical Aztec world of Smelogs Playground, nothing is static. Units possess hidden potential—they can evolve into structures, and buildings can morph back into warriors.

Unit Controlling and Combat

Lead your units to victory. From swift Ballers to punchy warriors to the powerful Obsidian Cannons, assemble your forces strategically. Micromanage troops during epic battles to outmaneuver foes. Witness the clash of armies as they vie for dominance.

Crystal Codex Spells

Tap into the mystical energy of the Crystal Codex. Learn powerful spells that can turn the tide of battles. Summon comet showers, heal wounded soldiers and structures, or uncover hidden enemies.

Base Editor

Define how your initial base should look like before the match has even started. You can place units and buildings for strategic depth right from the start of the match. Unleash your creativity! Design custom bases, and share them with friends.

Procedural generated maps with Neutral Objectives

Navigate, adapt, and overcome the unknown capture neutral objectives and beware of unknown creatures.

Player Progression and Customization

Advance through levels and unlock new challenges and cosmetics.
Personalize your appearance, avatar, border, and title. Stand out on the battlefield and let your enemies know who they’re up against.

Online Ranked Ladder Battles

Challenge the Best: Test your mettle against players from around the world. Climb the ranked ladder by winning battles. Rise through the tiers—from novice to grand master.
Elo Points: Each victory earns you Elo points, while defeats deduct them. Prove your strategic prowess and ascend to the top ranks.

Custom Game Lobbies

Host Your Arena: Create custom lobbies with personalized rules. Choose map settings, and even tweak resource rates. Invite friends or fellow strategists to join your private matches.
Variety Unleashed: Whether it’s a no-rush skirmish or a resource-rich clash, tailor the game to your liking. Experiment with unconventional strategies and settings.

Skirmish Against AI

Training Grounds: Hone your skills. Face off against cunning AI opponents. Adjust difficulty levels—from novice to deity—and learn the intricacies of unit management and base building.
Experiment and Learn: Try out new tactics, explore the tech tree, and discover hidden synergies. The AI adapts, so stay on your toes!

Single-player and Coop

Tackle dynamic missions, manage your loadout, and complete objectives while strategically navigating the Playground, balancing risk to secure successful extractions and progress further.

The Aztec realm awaits your command. Will you forge alliances, dominate the ranked ladder, or unravel the mysteries of Smelogs Playground?

JOIN OUR DISCORD

name: Smelogs Playground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon 570 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon 5700 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Preferred.

oflc.descriptors:
Online Interactivity
Very Mild Violence
Very Mild Coarse Language

short_description: Smelogs Playground is a Free-to-Play Real-Time Strategy game with charming aesthetics and a simple but effective gameplay mechanism. Take over the playful and rocky Smelogs to compete against each other for fun and honor!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Russian
*languages with full audio support
